WorkflowInfo.Name: Read specific line from text file
WorkflowInfo.Description: Read specific line from text file
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process reads a specific line (by name or number) from a file and sends it by mail.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\log.txt" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="1" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="SpecifiedWord" ResultSet="%readFile1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="readFile1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%getRows1%" ResultSetName="getRows1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 0" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns4:ConvertToHTMLTable DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." IsValid="True" Value="%getRows1%" /><ns5:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Report: SpecidiedWord is found in the following rows of file c:\log.txt" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="DefaultBranch" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
